title: Why be kicked for not locking in?
body: Why is it, when choosing a champ, that we get kicked out of the game if we havnt locked in but have selected a champion. Too many times have i chosen my champ, gone down to check masteries/runes etc and then get kicked with a 30 minute wait time.  Probably get people saying 'well just pay attention' or whatever, but its easy to get side tracked thinking about the game. It just bugs me.

replies.body:
For the same reason there is an afk check before you actually join champ select. It is to make sure everyone is still present and accounted for, to eliminate as many dcs/afks BEFORE game starts as possible.

It's just something you have to get into the habit of.

It's to make sure that you're paying attention, and not just setting and forgetting.

You have plenty of time to check your runes and masteries after locking in.

I think it's a it ridiculous myself. 
{{champion:53}}
